attributes.action: Put England football matches (the national game!) on free to air Television!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up of only those who want to pay for there tele being able to watch England Football matches.

I pay my TV License. I payed to go to digital on Freesat/Freeview because the government want us all to (and I had really dodgy reception!)

Please Prime Minister, If the FA need the money from SKY to run there business - stop paying the players so much money to play for their country! They should pay for the privilidge and the pride and the honour of it anyway! They get paid enough Monday to Friday (so to speak).

The English public deserve to watch 'their' team on the license fee paid Beeb.

The same really goes for ANY English team performance in ANY sport where our country is represented. (but more so football as it is the 'most watched' game/sport we have.

I will however, not hold my breath.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
